Sergei Rachmaninoff

Variations on a Theme of Chopin, op. 22

1903

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The theme, Frédéric Chopin’s prelude in C minor (op. 28 no. 20), is followed by twenty-two variations.

Duration: 28' 30"

Difficulty: 5
